mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry( inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_file, reg_date, inquiry_email) VALUES(#{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryFile}, SYSDATE(), #{inquiryEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_no as inquiryNo, inquiry_title as inquiryTitle, reg_date as regDate, inquiry_email as inquiryEmail FROM inquiry WHERE inquiry_email = #{email} ORDER BY inquiry_no DESC

SELECT inquiry_no as inquiryNo, inquiry_title as inquiryTitle, inquiry_content as inquiryContent, inquiry_file as inquiryFile, reg_date as regDate, inquiry_email as inquiryEmail FROM inquiry WHERE inquiry_no = #{inquiryNo}

SELECT inquiry_no as inquiryNo, inquiry_title as inquiryTitle, inquiry_content as inquiryContent, inquiry_file as inquiryFile, reg_date as regDate, inquiry_email as inquiryEmail FROM inquiry ORDER BY inquiryNo DESC
